title: Dagger +1
content:
Dagger +1 Uncommon 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The dagger's handle is smooth and light, its jagged blade sharpened into a thin, cruel edge. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 40

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The dagger's handle is smooth and light, its jagged blade sharpened into a thin, cruel edge.
